patthana23.23:4.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.23:5.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.23:6.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.23:6.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
